about_the_game:
In Death Scourges: Prologue, you're embody the captain of a special strike team which crash-landed in the ominous Blackwoods. Fight your way through unnameable horrors, scavenge the remains of a once thriving research site and unveil the secrets that lay deep within a giant laboratory.

CRASH LANDING


Your helicopter got shot down and you crashed into the Blackwoods before you got your full mission briefing... The deeper you advance into the forest the more you realise that this isn't a job like any other...

THIRD PERSON COMBAT


Target your enemies with the classic over-the-shoulder perspective and perform powerful combat attack on stunned enemies!

THE TEAM IS YOUR WEAPON


Your teammates Patcher, Nitro and Redlight obey your orders. The more efficient you place them, the more likely your odds of survival...

WEAPON ARSENAL


Manufacture powerful firearms that aid you mowing down the horros that lie hidden beneath. Find blueprints for pistols, mps, shotguns, rifles and more!

RESSOURCE MANAGEMENT


Manage your ressources and combine components to craft improvised combat ultility items such as medical stims and handgrenades!

content_descriptors.notes: A lot of blood. Limbs can be shot off. But it's all in a low-poly style.

name: DEATH SCOURGES: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 or equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8700k or equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 or equivalent
  • Storage: 12 MB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Temas sensíveis
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: In Death Scourges: Prologue, you embody the captain of a special strike team which crash-landed in the ominous Blackwoods. Fight your way through unnameable horrors, scavenge the remains of a once thriving research site and unveil the secrets that lay deep within a giant laboratory.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
